title: pankaja nAbhOtsavA
sahitya:
pankaja nAbhOtsava ghOSamippAril vilasannu


anupallavi

  shenkatirOn dyuti vellum dhvajAgrattil cemmE koTiyEriya nAL tuTarnniha


caraNam 1    niravadhi bhUsura vrndam vannu nErattAttAnandamOTE 
paramannamupadam shamiLitamAsvadiccum parama puruSanakkaNTatha vandiccum
    caraNam 2    pAramutsava rUpENa kAntaneccErum  pOlttAr mAninikku 
pArAtE chatram piTiccadu pOlavE dvArE makara tOraNangaL shObhiccu
    caraNam 3    vipaNigaLilum gEhagangaLilum vIthIcatvarAtigaLilum  
aparimitAndattOTu lOkar sarasalApa kautuka sannimagnarAyum 
    caraNam 4    nAnAvitAna jAlattAl lOkanAthan tannAlayamellAm  
UnamenniyE yalankariccum punarAnanda puramennorabhidha satyamatAyum
